name: FAnimNode_BoneDrivenController
doc: This is the runtime version of a bone driven controller, which maps part of the state from one bone to another (e.g., 2 * source.x -> target.z)

SourceBone: Bone to use as controller input
DrivingCurve: Curve used to map from the source attribute to the driven attributes if present (otherwise the Multiplier will be used)
Multiplier: Multiplier to apply to the input value (Note: Ignored when a curve is used)
RangeMin:
Minimum limit of the input value (mapped to RemappedMin, only used when limiting the source range)
If this is rotation, the unit is radian
RangeMax:
Maximum limit of the input value (mapped to RemappedMax, only used when limiting the source range)
If this is rotation, the unit is radian
RemappedMin:
Minimum value to apply to the destination (remapped from the input range)
If this is rotation, the unit is radian
RemappedMax:
Maximum value to apply to the destination (remapped from the input range)
If this is rotation, the unit is radian
ParameterName: Name of Morph Target to drive using the source attribute
TargetBone: Bone to drive using controller input
DestinationMode: Type of destination to drive, currently either bone or morph target
ModificationMode: The type of modification to make to the destination component(s)
SourceComponent: Transform component to use as input
LODThreshold:
* Max LOD that this node is allowed to run
* For example if you have LODThreshold to be 2, it will run until LOD 2 (based on 0 index)
* when the component LOD becomes 3, it will stop update/evaluate
* currently transition would be issue and that has to be re-visited
Alpha: Current strength of the skeletal control
bUseRange: Whether or not to clamp the driver value and remap it before scaling it
bAffectTargetTranslationX: Affect the X component of translation on the target bone
bAffectTargetTranslationY: Affect the Y component of translation on the target bone
bAffectTargetTranslationZ: Affect the Z component of translation on the target bone
bAffectTargetRotationX: Affect the X component of rotation on the target bone
bAffectTargetRotationY: Affect the Y component of rotation on the target bone
bAffectTargetRotationZ: Affect the Z component of rotation on the target bone
bAffectTargetScaleX: Affect the X component of scale on the target bone
bAffectTargetScaleY: Affect the Y component of scale on the target bone
bAffectTargetScaleZ: Affect the Z component of scale on the target bone
